# Basimol

This is a library intended to make it easy to make beautiful images of molecular structures. It sits on top of some great technologies:

- [Blender](https://www.blender.org)
- [Basilisp](https://basilisp.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
- [Basilisp-Blender](https://github.com/ikappaki/basilisp-blender)
- [Molecular Nodes](https://bradyajohnston.github.io/MolecularNodes/)

For building/ deploying

- [pixi](https://pixi.sh/latest/)
- [quarto](https://quarto.org)
- [Basilisp-Kernel](https://github.com/ikappaki/basilisp-kernel)
